img.title: primaveragraduate_updatedEdited
img.rs-layer:
IS A HIGH SCHOOL DIPLOMA
STILL WORTH IT?
IS A HIGH SCHOOL DIPLOMA STILL WORTH IT?

div.h3: Dear Primavera Students, Parents, and Guardians,
div.p: Governor Ducey’s announcement today stated that all state standardized testing will be cancelled for the 2019/2020 school year. During this uncertain time we want you to know that Primavera Online is open and ready to continue to educate our students. Our number one priority will always be our students’ education and safety. We’re here to support our community of students and families, if you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to call the school at 480-456-6678 Option 7.

Tamara Becker
Superintendent, Primavera Online High School

p.em: Notice: We are postponing all of our in-person Enrollment Open House events until further notice. The health and safety of our community is of the utmost importance to us. If you are interested in enrolling at Primavera, please click here.

p.strong: Prom has been cancelled due to COVID-19.

hr.p: Our top priority is to keep our students safe and prevent the spread of COVID-19, novel coronavirus.

Full refunds will begin processing on Monday, March 23rd. Ticket buyers can expect to receive an email confirmation that their refund has been completed within 3-5 business days.If you have any questions, please contact Ron Campton at [email protected]

div.h2: A quality online school that’s actually made for the 21st century

div.h4: Primavera Online High School and Middle School is unlike anything you’ve seen for a reason. We believe student success can only happen with the combination of an incredible curriculum and teacher support. And we make that happen.
Once you see what Primavera is about, we are confident you’ll make the same decision that more than 25,000 students throughout Arizona make every year.

div.div: Semester or six-week course options, personalized teacher support, flexible schedule, the list of differences goes on.

div.div: Most online schools settle for the bare minimum. But Primavera curriculum isn’t just accredited and NCAA approved. We go beyond alignment to provide an engaging curriculum, packed with videos and interactive material.
